I am currently working on a project on Air pollution, Human Mobility and Transmission of respiratory pathogens, SARS-CoV-2 inclusive. This project is part of my Postdoc with [Nurturing Genomics and Bioinformatics Research Capacity in Africa (BRecA)](https://www.breca.mak.ac.ug/). For this project we are working with our collaborators [AirQo](https://www.airqo.net/).
